TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRootObjectProvider

summary.span: 描述一个服务，该服务可返回所分析标记的根对象。

span.span: Describes a service that can return the root object of markup being parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务主要与由特定框架或框架中常用根元素类的功能公开的应用程序服务相关。The service is mainly relevant to application services that are exposed by a particular framework or by capabilities of a commonly-used root element class in a framework. 当 XAML 对象编写器调用值转换行为时，类型转换器和标记扩展可以在 XAML 对象编写器提供的服务上下文上查询 作为服务。Type converters and markup extensions can query for as a service on the service context that is provided by a XAML object writer, when the XAML object writer invokes value conversion behavior. 有关详细信息，请参阅[可用于类型转换器和标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions)[的 XAML 的类型转换器和标记扩展](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml)。For more information, see [Type Converters and Markup Extensions for XAML](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/type-converters-and-markup-extensions-for-xaml) and [Service Contexts Available to Type Converters and Markup Extensions](/dotnet/framework/xaml-services/service-contexts-available-to-type-converters-and-markup-extensions).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RootObject As Object
public: property System::Object ^ RootObject { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从标记中或从对象图中获取根对象。

span.span: Gets the root object from markup or from an object graph.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XAML 标记方案中的根对象可能对标记扩展方案非常有用，因为可以通过约定在 XAML 标记的根级别设置的特性。The root object in a XAML markup scenario might be useful for markup extension scenarios because of attributes that might by convention be set at the root level of XAML markup. 特定的根对象功能可能由框架指定。Specific root object capabilities might be specified by frameworks. 例如，某些属性可能只在根级别有效，或者框架可能支持从根继承全局属性。For example, certain attributes might only be valid at the root level, or a framework might support inheritance of global properties from the root.
